diagnosis.final_diagnosis: primary hyperparathyroidism due to unifocal primary hyperplasia of parathyroid glands
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with hypercalcemia and elevated serum parathyroid hormone levels. Dual-phase 99mTc-MIBI imaging showed significantly increased uptake in the hyperplastic lesion without extinction of the uptake, indicating the presence of hyperfunctioning parathyroid tissue.
